titleStmt.title: Good nevves out of the vvest, declared in a letter sent from Lieutenant Generall Cromwel, to a worthy member of the House of Commons. Shewing what great things God hath done by small means. Two thousand slain and taken prisoners: also fifteen hundred horse taken beside bag and baggage / Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
